attributes.additional_details: For years ticket prices have been on the rise pricing the working class people who built up the beautiful game out of modern football. Without a ticket price cap being introduced ticket prices will continue to rise until everyone apart from the most elite are priced out.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation that forces the FA to cap ticket prices for all football matches to a maximum of £20 for an adult ticket.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the cost of football tickets are a matter for individual football clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584632
